name: Mistletoe Monsoon
description:
Something has caused Santa's sleigh to crash and all his presents to rain down.  Collect as many presents as you can for Santa while trying to stay alive against an implacable enemy and save Christmas!

I recommend 1920x1080 windowed with anti-aliasing kept off. I apologize for any crashes or bugs.  I did some wild stuff to make a roguelike in this engine and learned a lot along the way.  This engine currently has a bug where once the credits roll, you can't start a new game, so you'll have to restart.  I hope you like it!

At this time, the game is as complete as I want to take it for now, barring any major bugs.  There are a few more things on my list that it could use like sound effects, enemy defeated animations, a couple more items to pickup and level things.

Controls (F1, H, ? in game):

WASD - Movement (relative to camera orientation)

Q - Rotate player counter-clockwise

E - Rotate player clockwise

Right click to rotate camera view

1, 2, 3, 4 - Player skills

J, K, L, ; - Player skills

5 - Pass a turn

Spacebar or  left click to interact or pickup presents

Created for Luna H for the 2022 Secret Santa Jam
